"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5556e2f3636872390d931700#post_5556e2f3636872390d931700
Music is an opiate I use sparingly.
Forgive me but I am currently reading Monarchist literature, making the case that kings and Imperial systems are indeed far preferable to democracy.
It is a case I am willing to hear out.

topics.body: Speaking of Nietzsche, does anyone remember the DC Animated movie Crisis on Two Earths? That movie was fucking awesome. You had a more cynical perversion of Batman's character, named after a character from Watchmen, and voiced by James fucking Woods. And that line that Bruce dropped near the end, "We are alike. We've both stared into the abyss. The difference is whe the abyss stared back, *you blinked.*" That line was so fucking cool!

topics.body:
According to multiverse principal there is a world where silent Hills was finished and became one of the greastest horror games.

Conversely there is one where Silent Hills is about a swagtastic hedgehog who, through the power of rock, learned to love again.
